alert.note: Alert for Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Glynn County through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Jekyll Island, or near Brunswick, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Jekyll Island, Sea Island and Country Club Estates. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
